endhai kandu sirithaai

velipadum pudhuroobam

Viswaroopam...


Chinna chinna anuvaai
mannukkulley kidappaan
vetupadum velayiley
velipadum viswaroopam ...

Enna roopam eduppaan
evarukku theriyum

roopam roopam roopam roopam .
vishwaroopam...		 English Translation
I tried my best :)
What did you think about him?
After seeing what you laughed ?
while a seed sprouts
a full form will come out

he is born for fire
he grew up with eternity
on a right time
his own form will come out

do you understand who is he ?
you can see him as fire
he created history breaking obstacles
can you remember ?

he is not a slave for anyone
he is not a king for anyone
he passes forest without
disturbing its serenity

What did you think about him?
After seeing what you laughed ?
while a seed sprouts
a new form will come out

he is born for fire
he grew up with eternity
on a right time
his own form will come out

multiple forms with different faces
 (like GOD krishna)..

like small small particles
he will reside under earth
while digging the earth
different faces will come out

which face he will take
who will know that ?
he will take forms alternately
from different faces

do you understand who is he ?
he is a fire, do you see it now?
he created history breaking obstacles
can you remember ?

he is not a slave for any one
he is not a king for anyone
he passes forest without
disturbing its serenity

face, face, face..face
form with different faces.

seo.title: Viswaroopam Lyrics Vishwaroopam Songs lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Viswaroopam Lyrics Vishwaroopam Songs lyrics from Viswaroopam. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by Shankar-Eshaan-Loy and sung by Suraj Jagan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
